BlipBlop is equipped with a Coffee Brew-and-Serve mode, perfect for starting your day right.
How to Activate: Simply say, "BlipBlop, it's coffee time!" BlipBlop will buzz happily and scoot over to your coffee maker, expertly brewing and delivering your preferred coffee to your favorite spot. You can even customize your coffee by adding, "BlipBlop, make it strong" or "BlipBlop, a little sweeter today!"

BlipBlop’s Kitchen Cleaning Mode ensures your kitchen is always spotless.
How to Activate: After a meal, just tell BlipBlop, "BlipBlop, clean the kitchen!" It will hum cheerfully, activate its extendable cleaning arms, and scrub counters, wipe appliances, and even do the dishes. For extra greasy situations, you can say, "BlipBlop, deep clean," and it will shift into turbo mode, attacking grime with extra vigor.

BlipBlop knows that a clean bathroom is a happy bathroom.
How to Activate: Whenever you want a bathroom refresh, say, "BlipBlop, bathroom tidy-up!" BlipBlop will scoot off to the bathroom, using its gentle cleaning tools to scrub sinks, mirrors, and even polish the tiles. For a full bathroom overhaul, say, "BlipBlop, make it sparkle!" and watch it work its magic, leaving everything gleaming.

BlipBlop can help you select the perfect outfit for any occasion.
How to Activate: Before bed, say, "BlipBlop, help me pick out clothes for tomorrow!" BlipBlop will analyze your closet, the weather forecast, and your calendar for the next day, then lay out a stylish ensemble. For special occasions, you can add, "BlipBlop, make it fancy," or, "BlipBlop, keep it casual," for tailored advice.

BlipBlop keeps you informed about the weather with a touch of personality.
How to Activate: To get the latest forecast, say, "BlipBlop, what's the weather?" BlipBlop will display the current conditions and forecast on its chest screen, while giving you a verbal rundown in a cheerful voice. For those mornings when you're unsure about your outfit, say, "BlipBlop, should I bring an umbrella?" and it will advise accordingly.

BlipBlop is not just functional, but also full of charm and personality.
How to Activate: When you need a little cheering up or company, say, "BlipBlop, tell me a joke!" BlipBlop will spin around, flash its lights, and tell you a funny joke. If you want a little dance, say, "BlipBlop, let's groove!" and it will perform a cute dance, complete with sound effects.

BlipBlop ensures your home is secure before bedtime.
How to Activate: Just before you go to bed, say, "BlipBlop, nighttime mode!" BlipBlop will check all the windows and doors, turn off unnecessary lights, and even play a soothing lullaby as it dims the lights in your bedroom. You can rest easy knowing everything is secure.

BlipBlop keeps your floors spotless with its integrated vacuum and mop.
How to Activate: When your floors need a touch-up, say, "BlipBlop, clean the floors!" BlipBlop will glide around, vacuuming up dirt and dust. For a deeper clean, say, "BlipBlop, mop it up!" and it will switch to mop mode, leaving your floors shining.

BlipBlop can keep track of your grocery needs and help with shopping.
How to Activate: As you cook, say, "BlipBlop, add milk to the list!" and it will update your grocery list in its memory. When you're ready to shop, say, "BlipBlop, what do I need?" and it will display your list, even helping you order online if connected to your shopping app.

BlipBlop helps you stay on schedule with reminders and time management.
How to Activate: If you need a reminder, say, "BlipBlop, remind me to call Mom at 6 PM." BlipBlop will chirp a confirmation and flash a reminder on its screen when the time comes. For tasks, say, "BlipBlop, set a timer for 20 minutes," and it will keep track, alerting you when time’s up.
